description: Master log of all FA20 datalog analyses

critical_findings.notes: Knock occurring at idle - likely false knock from exhaust/heat shield noise. DAM=1.0 and FKL=0° suggest ECU not treating as real detonation.
Transient lean spike during decel/fuel cut - normal behavior

recommendations.action: Apply ~4% positive MAF scaling to reduce negative LTFT
recommendations.notes: LTFT is -3.95% indicating base map is slightly rich. Scaling MAF up will lean out fueling.
DAM=1.0 and FKL=0° despite 1135 events suggests false knock. Check: exhaust rattles, heat shields, accessory noise. Consider adjusting knock threshold at idle if confirmed false.

analyses.reviewer_notes: Predominantly idle datalog. Fuel trims look reasonable. Knock at idle with healthy DAM/FKL is classic false knock pattern. Need WOT pulls for full assessment.
